dc_title_s: A Map of Old Greenland or Øster Bygd & Wester Bygd : agreeable to Egede's late description of Greenland. ; A Map of the Islands of Ferro or Farro according to Jacobson Debes. ; An improved map of Iceland.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scales differ. Inset diagram: "A draught of the whirlpool on the south east of Sumbo Rocks w. the soundings." Numbered "N⁰76." Relief shown pictorially. Map of Greenland has Teneriffe meridian. Dimensions: 3 maps on 1 sheet : diag. ; sheet 33 x 23 centimeters
